description: A humorous punchline about mummies and vacations.
title: Afraid to Unwind
n_1: The archaeologist is talking to the mummy in a tomb.
c1_1: Hey mummy, why are you scared of vacation?
n_2: The archaeologist grins, ready to deliver the punchline.
n_3: They both laugh together at the joke.
n_4: The archaeologist and mummy continue their conversation, smiling.
